name: Zeitgeist
movement: 20 feet on foot, 40 feet in Darting Form
description: The Zeitgeist is a medium humanoid creature that can alternate between agile and robust forms. In Darting Form, it exhibits rapid speed and elusiveness, while in Sluggish Form, it demonstrates resilience against physical damage.
memorable: Its ability to shift forms and rewind damage makes it a unique and challenging opponent.
goals: To outmaneuver opponents on the battlefield and survive encounters with its abilities.
relations: Related to other humanoids or creatures that manipulate time and space.
environment: Typically found in chaotic or unpredictable locations.
strengths: High Dexterity and Constitution provide good mobility and resilience.
weaknesses: Low Charisma limits its effectiveness in social situations and against mental effects.
attacks: Employs Darting Rend for quick, multiple slashing strikes or powerful Slam attacks in its Sluggish Form.
most_powerful_ability: Rewind ability allows it to negate damage or conditions, enhancing survival.
additional_information: Resistance to physical damage in Sluggish Form.
Can repeatedly shift between two forms each turn.
A special Tormented Scream ability that affects a wide area.
High mobility with the ability to Dash or Disengage as a bonus action.
test_queries: humanoid that shifts forms in battle
